full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 175 of 228 851 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 Q. I want to ask you some questions about this directory. Starting with the cover, what do you recognize about the cover? 2 A. This was exactly the same cover of the directories that I saw. 3 Q. Is it the same binding? 4 A. The same binding, binding. 5 Q. Turning to the pages, what do you recognize about the layout on the pages? 6 A. It was exactly as the books that I recall. 7 Q. Did you review every page of this exhibit last night? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. When you reviewed this exhibit, did you see entries that you recognized from the book you saw when you worked for 10 Mr. Epstein? 11 A. Yes, I did. 12 Q. Do you remember about how many? 13 A. There were many, many, many, many names. 14 Q. Were some of those entries for massage in Palm Beach? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. Is there a difference in the size of the font in this book-- 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. -- from the one that you remember? 19 A. Yes, these are much smaller font. My books, the books when 20 I was there, they were a lot thicker, and the font was larger, 21 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018048
